chatbot.title: Deposit & Withdrawal Support
chatbot.subtitle: We're here to help with your transactions
chatbot.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your deposit and withdrawal support assistant. How can I help you today?

responses.deposit: To make a deposit, please go to the 'Wallet' section and select 'Deposit'. Choose your preferred payment method and follow the instructions. Minimum deposit is $10.
responses.withdraw: To withdraw funds, please go to the 'Wallet' section and select 'Withdraw'. Ensure your account is verified before making a withdrawal. Processing time is 1-3 business days.
responses.processing: I'm checking the status of your transaction. Please wait a moment...
responses.contactSupport: If you need further assistance, our support team is available 24/7. You can also email us at support@example.com.
responses.thankYou: Thank you for your patience! Is there anything else I can help you with?
responses.default: I'm here to assist you with deposits, withdrawals, and any transaction-related questions.
